Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at Clark/Division. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at Clark/Division. 

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
